Egwu Egedege bụ otu n'ime ekike egwu ọdịnala ama ama na egwu ọdịnala ndị eze nke Igbo na-eme na South Eastern (omumatu -Anambra) Nigeria dum
Tọrọ ntọala na 1985,  ọ bụ ịlọ ụwa nke ụdị ochie nke ndị nna nna nke Unubi nke oge a mere
N'oge ahụ, ọ bụ ịgba egwu ọnwa, nke ndị ntorobịa na-eme
Otú ọ dị, emezigharịrị ya ka ọ dabara na usoro ọgbara ọhụrụ
Ọrụ ha bụ ngwakọta nke egwu, ịgba egwu, Ngwa na uwe ọdịnala mara mma
A na-ewebata arụmọrụ ha site na ọfụfụ dị ukwuu nke bụ akara mbata na-akpọsa otu ahụ, nke eze nwanyị na-edu
Ịbụ abụ na-amalite naanị mgbe eze nwanyị rutere ogbo wee were igwe okwu
Ọ bịarutere n'okpuru nnukwu nche anwụ, nke otu nwoke bu, onye ọzọ na-akpali ya n'azụ
Ọ na-abụ abụ mana mgbe ụfọdụ na-agba egwu maka ụda nke ngwa ahụ
Egwu Egedege bụ Oriakụ Theresa Onuorah mere ka ewu ewu n'obodo Unubi
Ọ lụọla ọñụ wee biri na Unubi
Aha Egedege sitere n'okwu obodo maka ịba ọgaranya na obi ike nke na-akọwa ihe kpatara eji ewere egwu egwu omenala omenala na a na-egwuri egwu naanị n'ụlọ ndị eze ma ọ bụ ezinụlọ ndị bara ọgaranya
Onye isi otu egwu  Unubi Egedege bụ eze nwanyị ha bụ Queen Theresa Onuorah
Ọ bụ onye isi na-abụ abụ ma ndị na-abụ abụ na-akwado ya mgbe ụfọdụ
O nwekwara ndị na-agba egwu  Onyi na-atụnye ụtụ na-eme ka Egedege bụrụ ndị ewu ewu

Egwu a bịara bụrụ ihe ama ama na ndị na-ege ntị site na otu egwu egwu ha, ihe ngosi ndụ, mmalite na ihe ngosi n'oge dị mkpa site na 1980s wee bụrụ onye ama ama site na ngosipụta ihe nnọchianya nke eze nke onye na-abụ abụ na-edu ndú
Egwu a nke Queen Theresa Onuorah na-ewu ewu dịka onye ndu Egedege dance of Africa nyere aka n'ịkwalite mosaic omenala nke omenala Igbo
Oge egwu egedege na-adaba na oge egwu a na-adabere n'ịkụ egwu, "ogene," ngwa ọla, Udu, ekwe na ọjà na ngwa egwu ochie ndị ọzọ
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọtụtụ ndị egwu nwere ọdịiche dị iche iche nke ịgba egwu na-enwekarị àgwà nke ejiji ọdịnala siri ike
E kwesịkwara iburu n'obi na okwu ndị a na-agụ n'abụ na-abụkarị oge e wezụga ntụrụndụ na-ekwukwa okwu ndị metụtara ọha mmadụ
Otu Egwu Egedege na-eme ọkachasị n'ememme omenaala Igbo na mmemme ama ama
Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-akpọ ndị otu egwu egwu ka ha mee, n'oge olili ozu, n'mmemme alụmdi na nwunye ma ọ bụ mmemme gọọmentị ndị ọzọ
Ezenwanyị ahụ yi uwe mwụda dị oke ọnụ nke a haziri nke ọma ma chọọ ya mma, nke ejiri eriri chaplet iri jide n'úkwù
Okpu-eze-ya bu ọla, nke ejiworo ábụbà ele nnụnụ machie
Ọtụtụ chaplet ndị ọzọ na-achọ olu ya mma
N'aka ya, o ji ịnyịnya ọdụ na mkpara ọla
Ndị na-agba egwu na ndị na-egwu egwu na-eyi uwe ejiji raffia n'úkwù na ogwe aka, nwa ehi na nkwonkwo ụkwụ, ọtụtụ olu olu, n'isi ha, ha na-eyi rịbọn na-acha obara obara
Isi n'ozuzu agba mmetụta bụ obara na ọcha
